summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Westlake properties; accepting a statutory warranty deed for Lot 1 and assignment of ground lease for Lot 2, a special warranty deed to Lot 3 and portions on Lots 8-11, a special warranty deed to portions of Lots 10, 11 and 12, and the assignment of leasehold interests in Lots 1, 2, 3, 8-12, all as located in Block 1 of Addition to the town of Seattle, as laid off by the Heirs of Sarah A. Bell, and assigning the administration of all such property to the Department of Community Development.
